channel.title: Quotes on ssamot's heretical rumblings
channel.description: Recent content in Quotes on ssamot's heretical rumblings

item.title: Literary snippets and their links to reinforcement learning
item.description: Some book quotes that strongly got my attention when I read the related passages, with minimal RL analysis. “The Industrial Revolution and its consequences have been a disaster for the human race…” , Unabomber manifesto – the whole book praises universal value functions and model free RL (vs model based stuff). “We see through the mirror, darkly”, Paul in Corinthians I, 13 – the quote is followed by a passage that discusses that at some point we will stop just receiving observations and the real world state will be revealed to us.
